name: shoes
description: This automation is for shoes store. By Altas

scripts.test:smoke: rm -rf allure-report && rm -rf allure-results && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
scripts.test:regression: rm -rf allure-report && rm -rf allure-results && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@regression'
scripts.report: npx allure generate allure-results && npx allure open

author: Altas Huseyin
